participant_1.background:
I sometimes spend hours whittling away at a piece of wood, even if it's not going to be very useful in the end.
I play basketball with my friends and enjoy going to concerts.
i like to paint.
I live in a rural area, where I can enjoy horseback riding and keep my mind off my loss.
i play bass.

participant_2.background:
I'm not married, but I'm very close with my nieces and nephews.
I work from home, and it allows me to spend a lot of time with my dog.
I like to go to tailgate parties with my friends and listen to Jacob Sartorius.
I'm going to the gym to lift weights, eat some healthy food, and then watch Magic Mike.
My first purchase was a journal that I would fill with my thoughts and reflections.

content.text: Hi, what do you like to do in your free time?
Hi, I like to go to tailgate parties with my friends and listen to Jacob Sartorius.
I enjoy playing basketball with my friends and going to concerts.
Oh cool, I like to go to the gym to lift weights, eat some healthy food, and then watch Magic Mike.
I work from home, and it allows me to spend a lot of time with my dog.
That sounds nice, I love spending time with my dog too.
I also like to paint and whittle away at a piece of wood, even if it's not going to be very useful in the end.
That's cool, I enjoy horseback riding and keeping my mind off my loss.
I'm so sorry to hear about your loss. I'm glad you have found something that you enjoy doing.
Thank you, I appreciate that. I hope you have a great day!
